desc.p: This field is used to define the Department which funded the balances in this account. It is used in the generation of cost of funds entries when one of MIS.INT.KEY.CR, MIS.INT.KEY.DR, MIS.INT.RATE.CR, MIS.INT.RATE.DR fields are used.
Must be the key to a valid record on the DEPT.ACCT.OFFICER file.
Mandatory
If not defined, value would be defaulted from the value of the field DEFLT.FUND.DEPT associated with the appropriate COMPANY field in MI.PARAMETER.
Specifies the type of Additional Cost of Funds that needs to be calculated on the Balances in this Account, in addition to the refinancing amount using MIS.INT.KEY/RATE.
For example Liquidity cost might be calculated in addition to the refinancing amount.
This field is a multivalue field associated with MIS.COF.RATE.CR/DR, MIS.COF.DEPT.

If both refinancing rates (MIS.INT.KEY/RATE) and type of Additional cost of funds (MIS.COF.TYPE) are not specified for the account, then the both of them will be calculated from the details if any, specified for the Account Group in MI.PARAMETER as pool rates.

If only refinancing rates (MIS.INT.KEY/RATE) are specified and type of Additional cost of funds (MIS.COF.TYPE) are not specified, then the additional Cost of Funds would not be calculated for the account.
Must be the ID of a valid record on the MI.COF.TYPE file.
Optional.
Mandatory if MIS.COF.RATE.CR, MIS.COF.RATE.DR, MIS.COF.DEPT are specified.
Represents the funding rate for Debit Balances of this account.
1-10 numeric characters plus a decimal point.
Optional input.
If value for MIS.INT.KEY.DR field is specified, no value is allowed for this field.
Represents the funding rate for credit balances of this account.
1-10 numeric characters plus a decimal point.
Optional input.
If value for MIS.INT.KEY.CR field is specified, no value is allowed for this field.
This key identifies the Account Number to which the refinancing and additional cost of funds details apply.
Must be a valid ACCOUNT ID.
This field is used within the Management Information module to define the Department which funded the Type of Additional Cost of Funds for the Account.
This is a multivalue field associated with MIS.COF.TYPE.
Must be a key to a valid record on the DEPT.ACCT.OFFICER file.
Mandatory if MIS.COF.TYPE is specified.

Represents the Additional Cost of Funds rate for credit balances. The rate would be applied while MI.COF.ENTRIES are generated, on the credit balances field of the account in the file BALANCE.MOVEMENT, identified by the field SOURCE.FIELD.CR of MI.PARAMETER.
This is a multivalue field associated with ADD.COF.TYPE.
1-10 Numeric characters plus a decimal point.
Mandatory if ADD.COF.TYPE is specified.

Represents the Additional Cost of Funds rate for the debit balances. The rate would be applied while MI.COF.ENTRIES are generated, on the debit balances field of the account in the file BALANCE.MOVEMENT, identified by the field SOURCE.FIELD.DR of MI.PARAMETER.
This is a multivalue field associated with ADD.COF.TYPE.
1-10 Numeric characters plus a decimal point.
Mandatory if ADD.COF.TYPE is specified.
Represents the key of the Basic Interest table whose rate for the currency of the Account would be used as the funding rate for Debit Balances of this account.
Must be a valid record on the BASIC.RATE.TEXT file
Optional Input
If value for MIS.INT.RATE.DR field is specified, no value is allowed for this field.
Represents the key of the Basic Interest table whose rate for the currency of the Account would be used as the funding rate for Credit Balances of this Account.
Must be a valid record on the BASIC.RATE.TEXT file
Optional Input
If value for MIS.INT.RATE.CR field is specified, no value is allowed for this field.
